title: YouTube Specialist
job_overview:
DESCRIPTION:
We’re a fast-growing sprinkler repair company based in North Texas, and we’re looking for a YouTube Growth Strategist from the Philippines to help us rank locally, grow our subscribers, and dominate search results using Shorts and smart content strategy.

This is a long-term position for someone who knows how YouTube really works—not just editing videos, but understanding titles, descriptions, thumbnails, tags, local keywords, viewer retention, and how to trigger Google’s video section with Shorts and service content.

WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING:
Uploading and optimizing YouTube Shorts 3–5x per day
Writing SEO-optimized titles and descriptions that target search terms like “sprinkler repair Plano” or “zone won’t shut off McKinney”
Adding location tags, playlists, and related video links to boost visibility
Organizing video content by city, service type, and problem type
Monitoring performance and reporting on CTR, retention, and visibility
Managing scheduling links and earning bonuses based on booked appointments
Collaborating with our in-house video team to improve hooks and thumbnails (no editing required, but understanding of click psychology is a plus)

REQUIREMENTS:
Experience managing YouTube channels, especially for businesses or service brands
Strong understanding of YouTube SEO, video structure, and retention principles
Fluent English (writing & comprehension) — we’re talking to U.S. homeowners
Confidence working with tools like YouTube Studio, TubeBuddy, vidIQ, Canva, or ChatGPT
Organized, consistent, and hungry to grow with a company
Fast and reliable internet connection
HOURS + PAY:
20 hours per week (flexible schedule, daily uploads required)
$450 USD/month starting pay
Bonus potential for each booked job that comes from your videos (via our scheduling link tracking system)

HOW TO APPLY:
Include the subject line: I’m Your YouTube Growth Strategist

Tell us about a YouTube channel you’ve helped grow and what you did

Share a sample YouTube Short title + description for this topic:

“Sprinkler system won’t shut off – Plano homeowner fix”

Bonus: Tell us one YouTube tip you think most businesses miss

We’re not looking for someone to just upload videos. We’re looking for someone who gets the game and wants to help us win locally—while building a long-term role with real potential.

If you’re sharp, strategic, and ready to own this channel, we want to meet you.
